devdoc.details: Provides function signatures and events that can be used by other contracts

params.loanId: ID of the loan to check

returns.active: True if loan is currently active
returns.liquidated: True if loan has been liquidated

params.monthsToPay: Number of months to pay (must be at least 1)

params.principalInETH: Principal amount requested (in whole ETH units)

params.user: Address of the borrower to unblacklist

devdoc.title: LoanData Interface

Blacklisted(address).notice: Emitted when a borrower is blacklisted

InterestRateChanged(uint256,uint256).notice: Emitted when protocol parameters are updated

LoanApproved(uint256,address,uint256).notice: Emitted when an admin approves a loan

LoanDisbursed(uint256,address,uint256).notice: Emitted when the loan principal is disbursed to the borrower

LoanLiquidated(uint256,address,uint256,u.notice: Emitted when a loan is liquidated

LoanRequested(uint256,address,uint256,ui.notice: Emitted when a borrower requests a new loan

MonthMissed(uint256,uint256).notice: Emitted when a borrower misses one or more months of payments

MonthlyPaymentMade(uint256,address,uint2.notice: Emitted when a borrower makes a monthly payment

ProfitTaken(address,uint256).notice: Emitted when accumulated profits are withdrawn

StrikeAdded(address,uint256).notice: Emitted when a borrower receives a strike

UnBlacklisted(address).notice: Emitted when a borrower is removed from the blacklist

TotalLoan().notice: Get total number of loans created

approveLoan(uint256).notice: Approve and disburse a pending loan

checkAndProcessLoan(uint256).notice: Check the loan status and trigger liquidation if conditions are met

payMonthly(uint256,uint256).notice: Pay one or more monthly installments for a loan

rejectLoan(uint256).notice: Reject a pending loan request and refund collateral

requestLoan(uint256,uint256).notice: Request a new loan and deposit collateral

takeProfits().notice: Withdraw accumulated profits to the management wallet

unblacklist(address).notice: Remove a borrower from the blacklist

userdoc.notice: Defines the external interface for the LoanData contract

documentation.text: @notice Emitted when a borrower requests a new loan
@notice Emitted when an admin approves a loan
@notice Emitted when the loan principal is disbursed to the borrower
@notice Emitted when a borrower makes a monthly payment
@notice Emitted when a borrower misses one or more months of payments
@notice Emitted when a loan is liquidated
@notice Emitted when a borrower is blacklisted
@notice Emitted when a borrower is removed from the blacklist
@notice Emitted when a borrower receives a strike
@notice Emitted when protocol parameters are updated
@notice Emitted when accumulated profits are withdrawn

@notice Check the loan status and trigger liquidation if conditions are met
 @param loanId ID of the loan to check

@notice Reject a pending loan request and refund collateral
 @param loanId ID of the loan

@notice Approve and disburse a pending loan
 @param loanId ID of the loan

@notice Remove a borrower from the blacklist
 @param user Address of the borrower to unblacklist

@notice Update monthly interest percentage
 @param p New interest percentage

@notice Update penalty percentage
 @param p New penalty percentage

@notice Update collateral ratio percentage
 @param p New collateral ratio percentage

@notice Update maximum NPL (Non-Performing Loan) percentage
 @param p New maximum NPL percentage

@notice Update the management wallet address
 @param w New management wallet address
@notice Withdraw accumulated profits to the management wallet

@notice Get total number of loans created
 @return Total loan count
